selected_quotes: Common pesticides can harm bees Jury is still out on a global ban #neonics #Pollinators
A tiny part of my brain has been set to WORRY ABOUT BEES for years.
Neocotinoid pesticides can be harmful to bees, but two new papers show conflicting results in different countries
A an interesting blog article from President of the Royal Society Wellington Branch, Phil Lester.
Pesticides hurt bees but the effects vary, so Aus/NZ urgently needs local research

citation.abstract: Two large-scale studies confirm that neonicotinoid pesticides can harm bees. But the effects vary widely in different countries, suggesting that calls for a world ban would be premature.
citation.title: Common pesticides can harm bees, but the jury is still out on a global ban
